edu.rit.pjmr

Class PjmrJob<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Job
      • edu.rit.pjmr.PjmrJob<IK,IV,OK,OV>
  • Type Parameters:
    IK - Mapper input key (data record ID) data type.
    IV - Mapper input value (data record content) data type.
    OK - Mapper output key (reducer input key) data type.
    OV - Mapper output value (reducer input value) data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Concordance01, Concordance02, Concordance03, Concordance04, WebLog01, WebLog02, WebLog03, WebLog04

    public abstract class PjmrJob<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
extends Job
    Class PjmrJob is the abstract base class for a map-reduce job in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework. A PJMR map-reduce job is designed to run on a cluster of multicore nodes. A PJMR map-reduce job consists of one or more MapperTasks plus one ReducerTask.

    To program a PJMR map-reduce job:

    1. Write Mapper, Reducer, Combiner, and Customizer subclasses as appropriate for the map-reduce job.

    2. Write a subclass of class PjmrJob.

    3. In the PjmrJob subclass's main() method:

      1. Configure one or more mapper tasks. For each mapper task, call the mapperTask(), mapperTask(copies), or mapperTask(nodeName) method. The method returns a MapperTaskConfig object. Call further methods on the MapperTaskConfig object to configure the mapper task with one or more Sources, one or more Mappers, and an optional Customizer.

      2. Configure one reducer task. Call the reducerTask() method. The method returns a ReducerTaskConfig object. Call further methods on the ReducerTaskConfig object to configure the reducer task with one or more Reducers and/or a Customizer.

      3. Optionally, specify the combiner class that the mapper tasks and reducer task will use. Call the combiner() method. If not specified, the default is to use the Combiner base class.

      4. As the last statement in the main() method, call the startJob() method.

    To run a PJMR map-reduce job, run the Parallel Java 2 launcher program, pj2, specifying the PjmrJob subclass and any command line arguments for the PjmrJob subclass's main() method. For example: 

         $ java pj2 MyMapReduceJob arg1 arg2

    Each mapper task runs on a separate node of the cluster. Each source in each mapper task generates data records to be analyzed; for example, the data records might come from a file or files stored on the node's local hard disk. Each mapper in each mapper task runs in a separate core on the node, in a separate thread. A mapper may optionally be specified to use a GPU coprocessor.

    The reducer task runs on a separate node of the cluster. Optionally, the reducer task may run in the PJMR job's process on the cluster frontend node. Each reducer in the reducer task runs in a separate core on the node, in a separate thread. A reducer may optionally be specified to use a GPU coprocessor.

    Once the PjmrJob's startJob() method is called, the mapper tasks and the reducer tasks all run in parallel. When all the mapper and reducer tasks have finished, the PJMR job terminates.

    See package edu.rit.pjmr.example for examples of PJMR map-reduce jobs.

    • Method Detail

      • mapperTask

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> mapperTask()
        Add one mapper task to this PJMR job. The mapper task may run on any node. To configure the mapper task, call methods on the returned MapperTaskConfig object.
        Returns:
        Mapper task config object.

      • mapperTask

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> mapperTask(int copies)
        Add the given number of mapper tasks to this PJMR job. The mapper tasks may run on any nodes. To configure the mapper tasks, call methods on the returned MapperTaskConfig object; all the mapper tasks will be configured the same.
        Parameters:
        copies - Number of mapper tasks (≥ 1).
        Returns:
        Mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if copies < 1.

      • mapperTask

        public MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> mapperTask(String nodeName)
        Add one mapper task to this PJMR job that will run on the given node. To configure the mapper task, call methods on the returned MapperTaskConfig object.
        Parameters:
        nodeName - Node name.
        Returns:
        Mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if nodeName is null.

      • reducerTask

        public ReducerTaskConfig<OK,OV> reducerTask()
        Specify the reducer task for this PJMR job. To configure the reducer task, call methods on the returned ReducerTaskConfig object.
        Returns:
        Reducer task config object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the reducer task has already been specified.

      • combiner

        public <T extends Combiner<OK,OV>> void combiner(Class<T> combinerClass)
        Specify the combiner class for this PJMR job. If not specified, the default is the Combiner base class.
        Parameters:
        combinerClass - Combiner class.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if combinerClass is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the combiner class has already been specified.

      • startJob

        public void startJob()
        Start this PJMR job.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if this PJMR job is misconfigured.
